Title: Requires the approval of the legislature for certain proposed rule changes
Summary: Requires the approval of the legislature for certain proposed rule changes relating to civil or criminal penalties, fiscal liability or responsibility, costs due by state residents, and changes to education curriculum.
LawCode: Add ยง201-b, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring the approval of the legislature for certain proposed rule changes
